title: Varus Buff Suggestion
body:
I know he got buffed this patch, and this is only a suggestion, I don't even know if he needs this buff or not but I thought it would be a nice addition to Varus players.

So no, I don't think this is needed, but it could be implemented.

W - Varus also gains 10 flat movement speed upon detonating Blight stacks upon enemy units up to a cap of 30 for each 3 stacks of Blight detonated. Lasts for 2 seconds, and can be refreshed upon detonating more Blight stacks...

replies.body: Buff %dmg on detonation so he has a harass if he needs buffs - tanks are ruining bot-lane so % damage is awesome (tanky junglers and supports) but he'd probably be too strong with any buffs atm.

Varus buffs r u serious?

Buff range on Q during earlier charge levels hed be top-played.
